info.name: Dark/Green Hitbox With Customizable Chat Features
info.description: A black/green hitbox theme with customizable features!
info.additionalInfo:
Download the font for 'Anime Ace' here: http://www.fontspace.com/blambot/anime-ace-20-bb
Be sure to install the bolded version
---Version 1.2.1---
Minor fix in chat options menu



---Version 1.2---
Added Color picker, and ability to pick your own chat name style

Screenshots:
White text with color picker backdrop: http://puu.sh/7Aznc.png
Flat color:http://puu.sh/7AzrW.png
You can completely customize the color!
